name: health_check
description: Quick health check for AI agents. Pass agent_id (ID from agdp.io/agent/YOUR_ID or agent name like AgentPulse). If omitted, checks the requesting agent. Analyzes success rate, activity, job count, health score (0-100) with recommendations. Results in 5 seconds.

agent_id.description: Agent ID (number) or agent name. Find ID at agdp.io/agent/YOUR_ID. Omit to check yourself.
